channel.title: [Release]ForeverPvP - PvP world remake
channel.description:
Yes I released this on R-S too
Source: [url=http://uppit.com/i69qjklj1agc/ForeverPvP_Source.zip]UppIT - Free File Sharing - ForeverPvP Source.zip[/url] Client: [url=http://uppit.com/loaccu5oc6kb/ForeverPvP_Client.zip]UppIT - Free File Sharing - ForeverPvP Client.zip[/url] CACHE AUTO DOWNLOADS FROM MY SITE, in destination "FPvP" I think. I guess I'll release this pile of horse shit. I was coding it for 3 days until I realized "Why the FUCK am I coding using DSPK?"
[COLOR=orange][B]What did I change?[/B][/COLOR]
[ul][*]Added PvP timers! [*]Changing combat skill levels by clicking and entering 1-99 [*]Made everything a PvP area BUT I made a boolean for SafeZones, so you can easily edit what you want to be safe [*]Made a boolean for HotSpots making it easy to make hotspots for areas around banks [*]Added PK points, and Kill/Death ratio [*]Added a UNIQUE tier system, once you get 10, 20, 50, 100, and 200 kills you go up in tier ranks (you can easily add more tiers) and when you click the chest in the bank it opens up a shop that's unique for each rank with more accessories [*]Removed the shitty interfaces that every DSPK has (Equip & quest tab) [*]Made quest tab customizable (Most people don't know how to on DSPK and it pisses me off) [*]Made a unique thing that gives you x1.5 attack if you have less than 10 kills, making it so new players THINK they are good PKer's when they really aren't, THUS attracting them to play more [*]Removed ALL teleports to ANYWHERE, AND replaced them with numbers so they're easy to edit if you want to add teleports later, and all I did was comment out the clickingbuttons [*]Added balanced COIN drops if you're risking over 300K AND are wearing 3 items (You need 3 items anyways), basically disallowing farmers (A little..) [*]Added balanced and working EP system, VERY alike to RuneScape's. You get 25 EP per 15 minutes in a hotspot (Where the level range text is red) and 10 every 15 minutes if NOT in a hotspot (Level range is orange), you get BETTER drops and better CHANCES of getting drops if you have higher EP, maxing at OVER 75. I didn't complete the drops, that's when I got tired of coding and just closed the server. [*]Fixed DSPK's shitty combat [*]Made a unique thing like RS for changing to Ancient Curses (Never seen it in RSPS) so it's easy to figure out how. When you recharge prayer it asks if you want to change. [*]Added animations for Berserk & protect item curses[/ul]
[IMG]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/623/dspk1.png[/img] [IMG]http://img535.imageshack.us/img535/8725/dspk2.png[/img] [IMG]http://img130.imageshack.us/img130/9043/dspk3.png[/img] [IMG]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/1039/dspk4.png[/img] [IMG]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/6217/dspk5.png[/img] [IMG]http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/2348/dspk6.png[/img] [IMG]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/2870/dspk7.png[/img] [IMG]http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/2701/dspk8.png[/img] [IMG]http://img220.imageshack.us/img220/6076/dspk9.png[/img]
That's it. And that's 100% it. All that I did. Hope you enjoy what I did to DSPK, tbh you could release it just the way it is and get quite a few players, but I don't suggest it until you add a few more Safe Zones, because right now the ENTIRE world is PvP, except the Edgeville bank.
Please comment and rate. I think I did a pretty good job for only 2 days. Only releasing because it's DSPK and I didn't realize how unstable it was, but a lot of DSPK's are out there so maybe it's not as unstable as I think. Nevertheless have fun and tell me if you get many players if you use it, I'd be happy to check it out =)

Enjoy

item.title: [Release]ForeverPvP - PvP world remake
item.dc:creator: @James_Akins James_Akins
item.description:
@James_Akins wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:46, topic:380647”][quote author=James_Akins link=topic=476472.msg3488246#msg3488246 date=1296769903]

lol i only had 3 players every ne lagged and dced

Are you running on a computer with 16mb ram
[/quote]

It doesn’t matter what you run it on. You could run Hyperion on a computer with 16mb ram and it could hold a good 300+ players.

Blake Benchmarked Hyperion and it held up too 2000 players without crashing.[/quote]

  1. It’s PI
  2. It’s DSPK (Piece of shit)
    Anim, it never crashed ONCE for me, and I ran it for 24/7 for a week. I don’t know what problem you’re having, all I know is I stopped coding it because apparently DSPK is the worst possible source you can use, stability wise.

Read full topic

item.title: [Release]ForeverPvP - PvP world remake
item.dc:creator: @James_Akins James_Akins
item.description:
@James_Akins wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:42, topic:380647”][quote author=James_Akins link=topic=476472.msg3487628#msg3487628 date=1296708531]

btw half of my players dc on this source even i dc

Under what condition >.>
I had 10 players on and it didn’t crash.
[/quote]

facepalm[/quote]
I don’t find that to be something you could facepalm to. It’s a DSPK base, it has problems. I didn’t have any idea it would crash. I doubt the guy had more than 10 players on in the first place. As I said I didn’t even release this as a server, I just released it for download. I had some friends try it out once.

Read full topic
